200025.Name: Aidan Lyle
200025.Card Text: Camarilla: Aidan gets 1 optional press each combat.

200114.Name: Antón de Concepción
200114.Card Text: Sabbat Archbishop of Chicago: Antón gets 1 optional maneuver during the first round of combat.

200116.Name: Antonio d'Erlette
200116.Card Text: Sabbat: While Antonio is ready, you can use 4 transfers to search your library (shuffle afterward) and/or hand for a mage ally he could play. Put that ally in play with life equal to its starting life and pay its cost as normal.

200123.Name: Apolonia Czarnecki
200123.Card Text: Camarilla: Apolonia can steal 1 blood from a younger vampire as a (D) action.

200186.Name: Bela
200186.Card Text: Independent: Bela cannot take political actions. -1 stealth.

200190.Name: Benjamin Rose
200190.Card Text: Camarilla Prince of Washington, D.C.: Benjamin can call a referendum to give you +1 hand size until the end of the game as a +1 stealth political action.

200249.Name: Carolina Vález
200249.Card Text: Sabbat Archbishop of Montreal: Carolina is immune to damage from allies and retainers.

201513.Name: Charles Delmare
201513.Card Text: Sabbat cardinal: Charles gets 1 optional press each combat.

200381.Name: Dr. Morrow, The Skindoctor
200381.Card Text: Sabbat: Morrow can put 1 graft counter on an ally as a (D) action. An ally with any graft counters gets -1 stealth. Black Hand.

200391.Name: Duality
200391.Card Text: Sabbat: You can draw 1 additional card after replacing a card requiring Vicissitude [vic] Duality played.

200421.Name: Emily Carson
200421.Card Text: Camarilla primogen: During your discard phase, Emily can burn the Edge to unlock.

200427.Name: Epikasta Rigatos
200427.Card Text: Camarilla Prince of New York: You can move an action card Epikasta played from your ash heap to your library after resolution (shuffle afterward).

200485.Name: Frondator
200485.Card Text: Sabbat bishop: Rescuing a vampire from torpor costs Frondator 1 fewer blood.

200498.Name: Gem Ghastly
200498.Card Text: Camarilla primogen: You and Gem can play cards requiring a Ventrue as if she were a Ventrue.

200549.Name: Gustaphe Brunnelle
200549.Card Text: Camarilla primogen: Gustaphe can enter combat with a minion controlled by your predator or prey as a (D) action.

200571.Name: Harold Tanner
200571.Card Text: Camarilla: In combat, the controller of the minion opposing Harold plays with an open hand.

200696.Name: Jeremy "Wix" Wyzchovsky
200696.Card Text: Camarilla: Jeremy can bleed with +1 bleed as a (D) action.

200707.Name: João Bilé
200707.Card Text: Camarilla: While João has no title, he cannot block titled vampires. He gets +1 stealth on actions to put vampires in play.

200763.Name: Kateline Nadasdy
200763.Card Text: Camarilla: During the polling step of a political action, Kateline can burn 1 blood to force a non-acting vampire to abstain.

200767.Name: Keith Moody
200767.Card Text: Sabbat: Your prey can burn the Edge during your unlock phase to burn 1 blood from Keith.

201516.Name: Lady Vadislava
201516.Card Text: Sabbat priscus: Once each round, Lady Vadislava can burn 1 blood to make the damage from her hand strikes aggravated that round.

200800.Name: L'Épuisette
200800.Card Text: Sabbat: L'Épuisette gets +1 bleed against a Methuselah who controls a ready Toreador.

200848.Name: Lodin (Olaf Holte)
200848.Card Text: Camarilla Prince of Chicago: Lodin can prevent 1 damage from an opposing minion's strike once each combat.

201517.Name: Lord Leopold Valdemar
201517.Card Text: Sabbat priscus: Leopold can strike, ranged: steal 2 blood or life (becoming blood).

200867.Name: Luca Italicus
200867.Card Text: Sabbat Archbishop of Philadelphia: Once each round of combat after the first, Luca can strike: 2R damage.

200879.Name: Ludmijla Rakoczy
200879.Card Text: Sabbat bishop: Cards requiring Animalism [ani] cost Ludmijla 1 fewer blood.

201026.Name: Mustafa, The Heir
201026.Card Text: Camarilla Prince of Istanbul: During the polling step of a political action, any older Toreador controlled by another Methuselah can move 1 blood from themselves to Mustafa to force him to cast his votes and ballots as that Toreador's controller chooses.

201085.Name: Osric Vladislav
201085.Card Text: Camarilla: Osric can burn a location you control to get +1 stealth for the current action.

201116.Name: Petra
201116.Card Text: Camarilla: Damage Petra inflicts on Baali is aggravated. A vampire burns 1 blood after using a press to continue combat with her.

201519.Name: Rurik Rakoczy
201519.Card Text: Sabbat: Rurik gets 1 optional press each combat. While /Ludmijla Rakoczy/ is ready, Rurik gets +1 bleed.

201213.Name: Rutor
201213.Card Text: Camarilla: Tzimisce get -1 intercept against Rutor.

201366.Name: Thomas De Lutrius
201366.Card Text: Camarilla primogen: Burn 1 pool after Thomas goes to torpor.

201388.Name: Troius
201388.Card Text: Camarilla Prince of Geneva: Troius cannot cast votes or ballots against blood hunt referendums. +1 strength.

201398.Name: Tyler McGill
201398.Card Text: Camarilla: In a referendum, Tyler gets +1 vote after any Methuselah burns the Edge for a vote. He cannot block Nosferatu.

201430.Name: Vasily
201430.Card Text: Camarilla Prince of Prague: Contesting a title costs Vasily 1 additional blood unless you have the Edge.

201438.Name: Victor Donaldson
201438.Card Text: Camarilla Prince of Atlanta: If a /Golconda: Inner Peace/ you play is canceled, you can move that card from your ash heap to your library (shuffle afterward).

201501.Name: Zane
201501.Card Text: Camarilla primogen: If Zane is not a prince, he can call a referendum to receive (and contest) the title held by a prince as a +1 stealth political action.

201529.Name: Alexa Draper
201529.Card Text: Camarilla Prince of Melbourne: During the polling step of any referendum, Alexa can discard 1 card requiring Dominate [dom] to get +1 vote.

201530.Name: Alexander Silverson
201530.Card Text: Camarilla Prince of Birmingham: Vampires must burn 1 blood to cast votes and ballots against referendums called by Alexander.

201538.Name: Bret Stryker
201538.Card Text: Camarilla: Bret gets -1 intercept against titled vampires.

201540.Name: Catalina Vega
201540.Card Text: Camarilla Prince of Buenos Aires: +1 bleed.

201545.Name: Dowager, The
201545.Card Text: Camarilla primogen: The Dowager gets +1 intercept during directed actions.

201547.Name: Flávio Gonçalves
201547.Card Text: Camarilla Prince of São Paulo: Once each combat, Flávio can strike: dodge.

201551.Name: Inês Tristão
201551.Card Text: Camarilla Prince of Rio de Janeiro.

201553.Name: Larissa Moreira
201553.Card Text: Camarilla primogen: During a bleed action, Larissa can discard a card requiring Animalism [ani] to get +1 bleed.

201570.Name: Sybren van Oosten
201570.Card Text: Camarilla Prince of Rotterdam: You can unlock Sybren after a referendum called by him passes.

201522.Name: Grimgroth
201522.Card Text: Camarilla: While Grimgroth is ready, mage allies cost Tremere you control 2 fewer pool to recruit. +2 bleed.

200575.Name: Hartmut Stover
200575.Card Text: Sabbat Archbishop of Berlin: Any vampire casting votes or ballots against a referendum called by Hartmut burns 1 blood once results are tallied. You can burn the Edge during your discard phase to gain 1 pool.

200634.Name: Ingrid Rossler
200634.Card Text: Camarilla Prince of Geneva: If Ingrid is ready at the start of your influence phase, you get +2 transfers.

200937.Name: Mark Decker
200937.Card Text: Camarilla Prince of Milwaukee: Mark gets an additional +1 strength in combat with a werewolf. +1 strength.

201312.Name: Stanislava
201312.Card Text: Camarilla Gangrel Inner Circle: Retainers employed by minions opposing Stanislava in combat lose their abilities. Allies cannot block her. +2 bleed.

201407.Name: Una
201407.Card Text: Sabbat Archbishop of Dublin: Combat cards requiring Fortitude [for] cost Una 1 fewer blood.

201478.Name: Xaviar
201478.Card Text: Camarilla Gangrel Justicar: You can unlock Xaviar after a referendum called by him passes.
